title: What is the Communicational Enneagram and How Can It Help You Communicate Better?
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses the use of the enneagram as a tool for personal growth and communication. The enneagram is a specific description of nine personality profiles that can help individuals understand themselves and others, highlighting positive aspects and softening negative ones. The author also discusses the importance of non-verbal communication and how it can be used to establish rapport with others. The article provides an overview of the different types of representational channels in communication and how behavior strategies are developed based on individual experiences. The article concludes by highlighting the nine enneagram types, with the first one being the reformer who values the avoidance of errors and the achievement of perfection. The integration of neuro-linguistic programming techniques with the enneagram can make individualizing psychological types possible in a few minutes.
content: Our school has studied this original Arabic method and we can very well call ourselves the “founding school” regarding it, with particular reference to the subject of “communicational”, for no one else has examined it in such depth. Its use is both personal and professional. In a personal sphere, it is used to examine self-knowledge, developing a much more balanced personality, as well as the ability to better communicate with the people who count in our lives. On a professional level, however, it is very efficient because it enables us to understand our interlocutor better, in both therapy sessions and at work meetings. Knowing the different types is interesting, for once we have understood the psychology of who we have in front of us, we can behave accordingly, therefore, establishing an instant rapport. To know yourself and more, the enneagram is not only a system for entering into an emphatic rapport, it is a way of “knowing yourself in a dynamic way!” It provides an evolutionary guide, solid and efficient; it invites you to experiment with new and powerful strategies, to develop with awareness and resolve compulsions. “Identifying yourself in a personality is only the first step to a healthy and balanced growth”. Thanks to the integration with neuro-linguistic programming techniques, the potential of this system is increased to the extent that it makes the individualization of psychological type possible in a few minutes. THE NINE ENNEAGRAM TYPES 1. REFORMER The most important value for these people is to “avoid error” and to achieve perfection!
last_phrase: The enneagram is a comprehensive system that provides a solid and efficient guide for personal and professional development. It offers us the possibility of extending self-knowledge, improving communication skills, and predicting and understanding the behavior of others. By using the enneagram effectively, we can achieve success at work by instilling a team spirit and better understanding the abilities of our team members. Hypnotic communication models like negative orders, when used appropriately, can also be effective in achieving desired reactions. Ultimately, with the enneagram and hypnosis, we have the tools to take control of our lives and make the most of every opportunity.
